patthana22.21:1.1_0: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.21:2.1_0: Hetuyā pannarasa, ārammaṇe pannarasa, adhipatiyā cuddasa …pe…
patthana22.21:3.1_0: Napītisahagataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.21:5.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.21:6.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.21:7.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.21:8.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cuddasa.
patthana22.21:9.1_0: Naācayagāmiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca apacayagāmī hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.21:10.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.21:11.1_0: Nasekkhaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asekkho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.21:12.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
